|wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A;AR5112A-00, CR2332.00E, 0534, CHINA; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=4.5 to 6GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5506;MSC, 5506, 534EG;1;InGaP/GaAs HBT;16-pin MLPQ; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5510;MSC, 5510, 539C;1;InGaP/GaAs HBT;16-pin MLPQ;3 mm x 3 mm; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.18-mips; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=wlan |default_ssid_regex=^wlan$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=password |oui=00:0B:6B |oui_eth=00:0B:6B }} ''IEEE 802.11a/g SOHO Access Point''
[http://www.atel.com.pl/produkt.php?hash=05375 Product page] :[http://www.atel.com.pl/doc/05375i_v_1_0_www.pdf Manual (PL)] :[http://www.atel.com.pl/doc/05375ie.pdf Manual (EN)] "CA804.00A" is silkscreened on the board. Per the manual, the device is running Linux (kernel ver. 2.4.18). ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
JP1     [(GND) (TxD) (...) (RxD) (...) (...)]
